entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is seeking information and trying to calm down.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Harry's brother, who has applied for a desk job in the Order so he can work from home.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Harry's brothers, who is providing information about Bill's new job.

entities.name: george
entities.description: Another one of Harry's brothers, who is also in the Order and trying to make contacts in Romania.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Harry's brother, who is working in Romania for the Order.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: A foreign witch who has a job at Gringotts to improve her English, and is receiving private lessons from Bill.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: The third Weasley brother, who works in the Department of International Magical Cooperation.

relationships.description: Bill is giving private lessons to Fleur Delacour.
Charlie is working for Dumbledore in Romania.
Percy Weasley works at the Department of International Magical Cooperation.
